title: Ryze's Combo?
body:
Obviously you can just mash your buttons but is/are there a specific combo(s) for Ryze that lets you put out more damage than if you just mashed?

If so, what are they and what parts of the game can I do them at depending on my CDR/Skills?

replies.body: To be frank, I'm not a Ryze player.  But Ryze has the most combo-intensive gameplay that exists in LoL.  Perfect executions of the exact right button presses is what makes Ryze go from over rated to OP.  High skill cap 'press the exact correct buttons at the exact correct times' champions are great.  Since I don't play him, I can't reveal what the secret cooldown spam orders are for every situation, but they exist.

qwqeqrqwqeq most damage

wqeqrqwqeq if you need the snare first

rwqeq if you need r to gapclose to snare first

Most damage: qeqwqr repeat.


Most common: qwe or qewr
max dps in team fights qrqeqwqqeqwq assuming youre hitting max amount of people, etc.
